parameters.name: From
parameters.description: The source of the request. Set the value to **honeypot**.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese.
*   **en**: English.

parameters.name: StatisticsDays
parameters.description: The time range of the data to query. Unit: days.

parameters.name: StatisticsKeyType
parameters.description:
The type of the asset to query. Valid values:

*   **vpcInstanceId**: VPC
*   **uuid**: server
